contentfulSermon.title: Ephesians: Week 3 - The Best News in 2 Words

fields.notesFormatted:
1. Sin separates

    Ephesians 2:1

    Genesis 3:8

    Mark 15:34

  2. We are either living for God or for Satan

    Ephesians 2:2

    2 Corinthians 11:13-15

  3. Everyone is in the same boat

    Ephesians 2:3

    Acts 4:12

  4. But God

    Ephesians 2:4-7

  5. Jesus gets 100% of the credit for our salvation

    Ephesians 2:8-9

  6. Created anew so we can do

    Ephesians 2:10
